thread.section_title: Aston Hotel Paris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good located and polite staff
thread.title_full: Good located and polite staff - Review of Aston Hotel Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Anel1207
title: Good located and polite staff
text: It was easy to find hotel because it has good location near metro and Roissybus station. We arrived from airport Charles-de-Gaulle by Riossybus. I think it is more comfortable then by RER. Hotel is very small, but cozy. We were stay there 3 nights. The room cleaned every day, towels changed every day too. The staff always helped, then we asked. I think, it is a good place to stay in Paris and not expensive. Only good emotions and impressions from this hotel and Paris.
